overview: Those beach-boy babes sure know how to have a good time – why, one session of sun-soaked copulation just wasn’t enough! Indeed, this gang of horny Czech stunners had so much fun in the Med that a second installment of sun, sea, sand and sex, sex, sex seems pretty much the only way to go. And if you thought the first episode was hot, just wait till you see what the local coastguards have got lined up for you this time! Super hot summer beach bareback fun!
title: Gaywatch 2
